extension.remark:
To use this package, OCR function must be ocr_function:yes.
                [name] must be the same as its file [name].py, it is case sensitive!
                The file [name].py must be under the root path.
                [app_name] is a main module to this package.
extension.name: MyWallet_PKG_CiscoVPN

extension.remark:
To use this package, OCR function must be  ocr_function:yes.
                [name] must be the same as its file [name].py, it is case sensitive!
                The file [name].py must be under the root path.
                [app_name] is a main module to this package.
extension.name: MyWallet_PKG_PCMS
